A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible. Terrible. A garbage fire. A betrayal. Ridiculous. MInd-blowingly dismal. An absolute and unmitigated failure. Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy should never be allowed anywhere near the Star Wars universe ever again. This movie is a failure on every level. A disaster. An out of control\, runaway trainwreck. Shockingly bad. A unique\, once-in-a-lifetime disappointment. Traumatizingly unpleasant.  It strains the mind to imagine how they could've fumbled any worse.
